title: Chopped Brussels Sprout Salad
directions: Whisk shallot, vinegar, oil, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl.
Place Brussels sprouts, apples, cranberries, almonds, sunflower seeds, and pumpkin seeds in a bowl; pour vinegar mixture over and toss to combine.
ingredients: 6 cups Brussels sprouts, trimmed, halved, and sliced
2 Gala apples, cored and thinly sliced
